original_text:
Despite false visions concerning you
    and lying divinations about you,
it will be laid on the necks
    of the wicked who are to be slain,
whose day has come,
    whose time of punishment has reached its climax.
korean_text: 네게 대하여 허무한 것을 보며 네게 대하여 거짓 복술을 하는 자가 너를 중상 당한 악인의 목 위에 두리니 이는 그의 날 곧 죄악의 마지막 때가 이름이로다

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너에 대한 거짓 점괘에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: it will be laid on the necks
of the wicked who are to be slain
whose time of punishment has reached its climax
